choices: Right inbetween your friends Bill and Samantha
1.content: Your just hanging around on your computer in your room, just surfing the net. You've been bored all day and haven't had anything to do whatsoever. Then, you saw a flash outside. You look outside and see some form of shooting star, and it was heading straight for your house. As it gets closer, you notice that it was slowing down. Then, it hit the house. Where did it hit?
1.title: It Begins

choices: Your Mother walks in to ask what's going on
You test out if the bracelet works
11.content:
The shooting star shoots straight through your window. You get up and go over to it to see that it's a bracelet. You pick it up and find out that it's a pitch black bracelet with a small piece of paper attached to it. You pick up the piece of paper. This is what it says:

Greetings New User,
By now, you have gotten both the bracelet and realized that it is most likely not a normal one. I would like to be the first to congradulate you on your new discovery. The bracelet has the power to grant wishes to who ever wheres the bracelet. WARNING=THE BRACELET WILL GRANT WISHES BUT WILL NOT GRANT THEM LIKE YOU PLANNED SOMETIMES. We also caution you to keep the bracelet a secret. Have Fun

You put down the note and look at the bracelet. You put it on and=
11.title: You Got a Present

112.content: First off, you gender is?
112.title: You test out if the bracelet works

choices: That your family would do everything you said.
1121.content: Alright, you decide that you should just test out the bracelet. You put it on and wish:
1121.title: Male

choices: No, have some fun with them first.
11211.content:
You laugh a little while staring at the black band around your arm. Of course, you're very eager to try it but are somewhat cautious by what the note said. "It will grant wishes but sometimes not as planned." You decide to start with something very simple and harmless.

"I wish my two friends were here."

You suddenly had a gigantic crash coming from downstairs followed by an "OH MY GOD!" Gulping, you cautiously walk down the stairs to discover your friend Samantha's car sticking out through the wall of your living room. Your mother looks like she's having a conniption fit in the corner. Sam and Bill are busy apologizing to your enraged mom.

"I-I'm sorry Ms. Johnson...T-there was a skunk in the middle o-of the road and I had to swerve to m-miss it...T-then one thing led to another." Said Sam.

"My mom's gonna kill me Sammy." Said Bill.

Well it seems the wish worked, though certainly not in the manner you expected. Maybe trying another wish would prevent your mom from not blowing her stack on your two best friends, you whispered under your breath.

"I wish my mom wouldn't freak out about the hole in the wall."

Like magic, your mom did a complete one eighty in her personality. "Oh don't worry you two! I've been meaning to add a window there anyway! Come to the kitchen, I'll call a tow truck. You can have some lemonade. Where's Saun? Oh, there he is! Your friends are here Saun!"

Bill and Sam had amusing looks on their faces. Clearly they had no idea what in the world was going on. You snickered under your breath and waved hello to them. Eventually you all found yourselves sitting at the kitchen table, enjoying a nice drink. Sam was still visibly shaking at having driven a car through your house while Bill seemed more interested in discussing the latest video game. Your mom hummed merrily while dusting around the old red pick-up truck.

Should you tell your friends about the bracelet?
11211.title: Well that was unexpected...

11212.content: You wish that your family would do everything you said. You feel a bit light headed, but only for a split second. You go downstairs to test your power. You see your mother in the kitchen preparing lunch. Also, Ashlind is watching TV in the living room. Who do you decide to control?
11212.title: Family obeys you

choices: Wander off and have more fun
112121.content:
Ashlind, your 18-year-old sister, was watching TV. She was the Cheerleading Captain and wore her brown hair down to the small of her back. Her bare-midriff, pink tank-top barely contained her DD-cup breasts while her miniskirt showed off her legs. It was evident that she took pride in her look.

As you wondered what to do with her, the doorbell rang. You sister got up and walked to the front door with a seductive sway to her hips. Opening the door, she discovered her 20-year-old boyfriend, Austin.
"Oh, hi Austin!" she giggled.
"May I come in?" smiled Austin.

They started chatting as you came up with an idea.
"Ashlind, come here!" you shouted at her.
"No, you twerp!" she snapped back but she lost control of her body and walked over to you, shouting all the time.
"Shut up and listen!" you tell her. Her mouth is sealed but she seems to be struggling. You silently wish that your family was submissive to you, rather than controlled. Ashlind eased.
"I want you to embarrass yourself and then dump Austin!" you tell her. Standing 6'7", Austin was on the local College's basketball team. Ashlind was a proud girlfriend, but that would soon change.
112121.title: Ashlind

1122.content: So, what will you wish for?
1122.title: Female

11221.content:
You had always been the fattest girl in school, weighing in at 322 pounds.

"I wish I would lose this 150 pounds! I hate being fat!" you said

The bracelet glowed. You found yourself getting lighter. When the glowing was done, you looked in the mirror. You were thin, and wearing giant baggy clothes.

"I-I'm beautiful!" You tear up

Then, all of sudden-
11221.title: To lose weight.

112211.content: It came from Ashley's room. Ashley and you have always been really close. You run down the hallway. When you enter-
112211.title: You hear a scream

1132.content: What do you look like?
1132.title: Female

choices: Use the Bracelet to make your sister's curves go to one place
Use the bracelet to spread out your fat
11322.content:
Your older sister walked in. She was very large, but she had it in all the right places.

"Hey Saun." She said mockingly

"It's Sauna, and what are you doing in my room?"

Your sister looked down at your belly. She smirked.

"I see you haven't done anything about your belly issue."

"Shut up. What do you want?"

"I was just here to mock you. Goodbye."

She laughed as she walked out.

You are infuriated by your sister's behavior. You decide to-
11322.title: Chubby

12.content: the twins are passed out on bed
12.title: Your twin siblings room

choices: That you would do everything she said
That you had a foot fetish
13.content:
You and your sister have always had a bad relationship. You, always focused to annoy her in every manner possible. You played with her dolls without her permishion, read her diary, fought all the time, even wore her clothes just to make fun of her. Even through all this, you two still have a shred of love for each other. When you saw that star go to her room, for some reason, it seemed to take you 5 minutes just to go down the hall and check it out. But when you got there, it looked like nothing happened.

As soon as you turned the corner, your sister was there. She smiles and says, "Perfect, a test." She puts the bracelet on and wishes
13.title: Your older sister's room

choices: You decide to share the bracelet kindly
You decide to fight over it
Your mom comes out and confiscates it.
15.content:
The star shot and landed right inbetween your friends Bill and Samantha, who were on their way to your house anyway. When the smoke and debris cleared, you watched as they picked it up.

"Wow," said Samantha, "This must be a moonrock or something." Then she noticed, as she picked it up, that it was a bracelet made of rock. She picked it up, just to have Bill snatch it from her. Bill has a habit of snatching things away. He doesn't mean to be rude or anything, that's just Bill.

"I think your right," he said. Then he snickered, "For once." Samantha slapped him in the back of the head and took the stone back. You began to head downstairs.

Then, Samantha said to Bill, "Man this is cool." Bill nodded. She put it on and looked at it on her wrist. Loving it, she said, "I wish that Saun was here." Then, the next thing you know is that your standing right in front of them both. They both flinch. "I know what this is," she smiled, "This must be some type of wishing bracelet or something."
15.title: Friendly Power

151.content:
Deciding that you guys have been friends for the longest of times, you quickly say, "Hey, how about we go to my room and discuss it there?"

Your friends look up and say, "okay." Samantha wishes that you all were inside your room. Then, she wishes that nobody had any memory of the explosion or anything, except for you, Bill, and her. After all that wishing was done, she wished that nobody would desturb you all until wished otherwise.

She turned to you and Bill, "So, how are we going to solve this?" She put the bracelet out onto the bed and closed the curtains.

Then, Bill's face lit up, "I think that we should just screw around with it. Then, at the end of each day, we'll have a different one of us bring it home to take care of it." You all agree that it's a great idea. By the way, are you boy or a girl?
151.title: Friendship First

choices: That you and your friends would clean the whole house just the way she wanted.
That you and your friends would be super hungry, but she could only feed you.
That you had no siblings sure that she didn't have to worry any more
153.content:
"Alright," you say, "I think..." Then you were cut off as your mom came out of the house. Seeing the crater and the bracelet, she wastes no time.

"Hey," she says, "that could be radioactive." She moves as fast as lightning as she snatches away the bracelet. When she does, you and your friends get really angry and start arguing with her. She argued back, claiming that it could be dangerous. After about ten minutes, just when you thought that you had won the argument, your mom says, "God. I wish that you and your friends would just shutup and go do chores around my house like I had to do when you were my age."

Suddenly, you and your friends stopped talking and ran into the house, grabbing cleaning supplies, and cleaned. Your mom comes in and, catching on fast, realizes what the bracelet does. After letting you guys clean up some, she says, "I wish that you could talk and would stop cleaning the house."

You stop. Immediatly, you all start arguing. Then, your mom wishes:
153.title: Busted

info.brief_description: A bracelet comes into the possetion of your household.
info.description:
A magical bracelet comes into the possession of somebody in your house. It has the power to grant wishes to the wearer.

Rules: Not Many
1. Don't be to descriptive with sex
2. I'll get them as I go.

Characters: You=Saun (15)
Your mom (36)
Your friend Bill (14)
Your other friend Samantha (15)
Your twin younger siblings Ashley and Billy (8)
Your older sister Ashlind (18)
